meanings.definition: A type of vehicle construction in which the body and frame are combined into a single unit.
meanings.sent1: The unibodies of modern cars make them more durable.
meanings.sent2: Auto manufacturers are increasingly using unibodies for their vehicles.
meanings.sent3: The unibodies of these cars are like a strong shield protecting the passengers.
meanings.sent4: The unibodies of the vehicles hold them together like a tight embrace.
meanings.sent5: In a collision, the unibodies absorb the impact to keep the occupants safe.
